mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inspection_frequency( inspection_frequency_no, od_room_temp_freq, od_relative_humidity_freq, od_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq, od_preheat_temp_freq, od_blast_finish_sa25_freq, od_surface_dust_rating_freq, od_profile_freq, od_pipe_temp_after_blast_freq, od_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq, od_application_temp_freq, od_base_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq, od_top_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq, od_total_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq, od_top_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq, od_middle_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq, od_base_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq, od_total_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq, od_cutback_freq, od_epoxy_cutback_freq, od_magnetism_freq, od_coating_bevel_angle_freq, od_holiday_freq, od_abrasive_conductivity_freq, od_rinse_water_conductivity_freq, od_adhesion_rating_freq, id_room_temp_freq, id_relative_humidity_freq, id_blast_finish_sa25_freq, id_profile_freq, id_dry_film_thickness_freq, id_cutback_freq, id_residual_magnetism_freq, id_wet_film_thickness_freq, id_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq, id_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq, id_surface_dust_rating_freq, id_holiday_freq, id_roughness_freq, id_pipe_temp_freq, id_abrasive_conductivity_freq ) VALUES ( #{inspection_frequency_no}, #{od_room_temp_freq}, #{od_relative_humidity_freq}, #{od_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq}, #{od_preheat_temp_freq}, #{od_blast_finish_sa25_freq}, #{od_surface_dust_rating_freq}, #{od_profile_freq}, #{od_pipe_temp_after_blast_freq}, #{od_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq}, #{od_application_temp_freq}, #{od_base_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_top_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_total_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_top_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_middle_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_base_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_total_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, #{od_cutback_freq}, #{od_epoxy_cutback_freq}, #{od_magnetism_freq}, #{od_coating_bevel_angle_freq}, #{od_holiday_freq}, #{od_abrasive_conductivity_freq}, #{od_rinse_water_conductivity_freq}, #{od_adhesion_rating_freq}, #{id_room_temp_freq}, #{id_relative_humidity_freq}, #{id_blast_finish_sa25_freq}, #{id_profile_freq}, #{id_dry_film_thickness_freq}, #{id_cutback_freq}, #{id_residual_magnetism_freq}, #{id_wet_film_thickness_freq}, #{id_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq}, #{id_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq}, #{id_surface_dust_rating_freq}, #{id_holiday_freq}, #{id_roughness_freq}, #{id_pipe_temp_freq}, #{id_abrasive_conductivity_freq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE inspection_frequency set inspection_frequency_no=#{inspection_frequency_no}, od_room_temp_freq=#{od_room_temp_freq}, od_relative_humidity_freq=#{od_relative_humidity_freq}, od_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq=#{od_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq}, od_preheat_temp_freq=#{od_preheat_temp_freq}, od_blast_finish_sa25_freq=#{od_blast_finish_sa25_freq}, od_surface_dust_rating_freq=#{od_surface_dust_rating_freq}, od_profile_freq=#{od_profile_freq}, od_pipe_temp_after_blast_freq=#{od_pipe_temp_after_blast_freq}, od_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq=#{od_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq}, od_application_temp_freq=#{od_application_temp_freq}, od_base_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_base_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_top_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_top_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_total_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_total_2fbe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_top_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_top_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_middle_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_middle_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_base_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_base_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_total_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq=#{od_total_3lpe_coat_thickness_freq}, od_cutback_freq=#{od_cutback_freq}, od_epoxy_cutback_freq=#{od_epoxy_cutback_freq}, od_magnetism_freq=#{od_magnetism_freq}, od_coating_bevel_angle_freq=#{od_coating_bevel_angle_freq}, od_holiday_freq=#{od_holiday_freq}, od_abrasive_conductivity_freq=#{od_abrasive_conductivity_freq}, od_rinse_water_conductivity_freq=#{od_rinse_water_conductivity_freq}, od_adhesion_rating_freq=#{od_adhesion_rating_freq}, id_room_temp_freq=#{id_room_temp_freq}, id_relative_humidity_freq=#{id_relative_humidity_freq}, id_blast_finish_sa25_freq=#{id_blast_finish_sa25_freq}, id_profile_freq=#{id_profile_freq}, id_dry_film_thickness_freq=#{id_dry_film_thickness_freq}, id_cutback_freq=#{id_cutback_freq}, id_residual_magnetism_freq=#{id_residual_magnetism_freq}, id_wet_film_thickness_freq=#{id_wet_film_thickness_freq}, id_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq=#{id_salt_contamination_before_blast_freq}, id_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq= #{id_salt_contamination_after_blasting_freq}, id_surface_dust_rating_freq=#{id_surface_dust_rating_freq}, id_holiday_freq=#{id_holiday_freq}, id_roughness_freq=#{id_roughness_freq}, id_pipe_temp_freq=#{id_pipe_temp_freq}, id_abrasive_conductivity_freq=#{id_abrasive_conductivity_freq} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from inspection_frequency
AND inspection_frequency_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inspection_frequency_no},'%')
SELECT * from inspection_frequency ORDER BY id DESC

select o.* from contract_info c inner JOIN project_info p on c.project_no=p.project_no inner JOIN inspection_frequency o on p.inspection_frequency_no=o.inspection_frequency_no WHERE c.contract_no=#{contract_no}
